thread.title_full: Competition: Win a luxury family glamping holiday | #WhyNot? - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Competition: Win a luxury family glamping holiday | #WhyNot?
text: To help get you moving (almost) like you did in your twenties, the Telegraph, in association with Voltarol, has come up with 120 activities, challenges, outings and adventures for you to pencil into the diary. If you’re into family activities, consider climbing the O2 with your kids or organising a water fight in your garden . And if you’re looking to make new friends (or reconnect with old ones), why not up the stakes and try a street dance class ? (Forty-year-old dad Harry Wallop just about managed it! ) Or, if you’re an adrenalin junkie, why not take on something to get the pulse racing, such as learning the flying trapeze ? In the meantime, #WhyNot enter the competition for the chance to get back to nature – with all home comforts – on a week-long family glamping holiday? Choose any Feather Down Farm location across the UK and enjoy a captivating camping experience in a fully-equipped luxury canvas lodge, with everything you need for a truly comfortable stay in some of the most scenic locations in the country. Wake up to fresh air, the sight of friendly farm animals, peaceful walks and plenty of envigorating outdoor activities to get you really moving. Simply answer the question below to be in with a chance of winning. Entrants must be aged 18 or over and the competition closes at midnight on Sunday 23 August 2015. Promoter: Telegraph Media Group Limited, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT Online Form - Win a luxury family glamping holiday
